About the King’s University Financial Aid

The The St. Thomas University University The University University Financial Aid programme is given to students in the form Grants and Loans to assist students manage the studentship in the University. The aids is given from both Government of Canada and the University.

Eligibility for The King’s University Financial Aids

To be eligible to qualify for the University financial Aids programme, applicants must be fully admitted to take a course in the University and also fulfill all requirements as indigene of the state or fully registered as international students residing in the state for the purpose of taking a course in the University.

How to Apply| How to apply for Kingsu Financial Aid

  • To apply for the University Financial Aid,
  • Submit your OSAP application online,
  • Print and sign the consents and declaration pages
  • Sign any other required documents
  • Upload them online or submit by mail or in person to Enrolment Services.

Ready to apply? Click herehttps://www.kingsu.ca/admissions/financial-aid/contact-us

Do you also need to learn more about the The University .The University educational system, you can write to us through the contact page link and we will send you details about the university.
